home.title: WEBSITE DEVELOPER
home.summary: Passionate about building high-performance, scalable, and maintainable web applications. Specializing in turning complex problems into effective and optimized solutions.

about.title: Who am I?
about.description2: , and I am also training to become a
about.description3: I am a student at HCMUNRE, a university that is not particularly strong in IT. Therefore, most of my programming knowledge comes from self-learning and practice.
about.description4: I always strive to learn and improve myself through each project to develop increasingly refined applications.
about.description5: My team appreciates me for my strong teamwork skills, my ability to keep a fun and friendly atmosphere, while still ensuring that assigned tasks are completed on schedule.
about.description6: I also enjoy sharing new technology with friends to learn together and improve our products, making them more aligned with current market trends.

experiences.description1: Everything I have learned and done is summarized here!
experiences.description2: You can check out the details below.

overview.title: Experience/Knowledge
overview.description1: I have 3+ years of experience in building and developing websites and web-based applications.
overview.description2: I have experience working with technologies and languages such as ReactJS, NextJS, Material UI, Tailwind, Antd, HTML5, SCSS, TypeScript, Redux Toolkit, etc.
overview.description3: I have experience in website layout design, responsiveness, and cross-browser compatibility using tools like Figma.
overview.description4: I have basic knowledge of databases like SQL and MongoDB.
overview.description5: Additionally, I have used and worked with backend technologies like NodeJS.
overview.description6: Although my main focus is building websites, I can also support mobile app development teams (Flutter) when needed.
overview.description7: Regarding languages, I can use English in my work, including reading and understanding technical documentation.

experiences.title: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
experiences.subTitle: Ho Chi Minh University of Natural Resources and Environment
experiences.description:
- Major in Information Technology with a focus on web application development and system design.
- Studied and researched principles of system analysis and website/application design.
- Gained basic knowledge in game development with Unity.
- Applied theoretical knowledge to real-world projects and practical applications.

dsu.title: DISION Tech Limited Company
dsu.subTitle: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
dsu.description:
- Developed and optimized website plugins, managing and improving plugins using Turborepo to enhance performance and scalability.
- Researched and implemented the Multi-Tenant model to improve scalability and data management across clients.
- Gained deep insights into security and the critical functionalities of EDR (Endpoint Detection and Response) systems.
- Worked in an Agile environment, ensuring timely product development in each sprint.
- Assisted in developing the internal "Daily Report" website.

saigonMio.title: Saigon MIO Technology JSC
saigonMio.subTitle: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
saigonMio.description:
- Built website UI for projects using JavaScript (ReactJS/NextJS) and optimized components for reusability.
- Contributed over 40% to the UI development process, taking primary responsibility for development progress and feature implementation.
- Worked with the MVC architecture while integrating React for a component-based UI approach.
- Maintained, reported, and optimized website performance and SEO, successfully achieving high search rankings on Google.
- Ensured website responsiveness across all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop).
- Implemented Axios Interceptors for centralized error handling, boosting team efficiency by 10%.
- Conducted knowledge-sharing sessions on Next.js and contributed to its adoption in future frontend projects.
- Improved the website based on customer feedback and participated in direct meetings to clarify requirements and guide product development.
- Supported the Mobile App development team in building UI and optimizing performance.

bessfu.title: BESSFU Solution Technology Company Limited
bessfu.subTitle: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
bessfu.description:
- Developed and implemented user-friendly UI components based on Figma designs using Next.js, React.js, and MUI Material.
- Contributed to the frontend development of an e-learning platform for the VUS English learning system, ensuring a smooth user experience and responsiveness.
- Optimized application performance and UI responsiveness to provide an engaging learning experience across devices.
- Assisted in developing interactive English learning mini-games using JavaScript and jQuery to enhance student engagement.
